summary: Joe Marshall and Frank Washington are two tenacious police detectives who seek at all costs to stop the Katana, a renegade Yakuza gang composed of violent and sadistic killers who want to lead the drug trade in Los Angeles.
cast: Robert Z'Dar|Mathew Karedas|Janis Farley|Mark Frazer|Melissa Moore|Cameron|Gerald Okamura|Dale Cummings|Cranston Komuro|Joselito Rescober|Jerry Black|Orlando Quijano|James Waltz|Reginald Williams|Tom Gleason|Robert Moore|Fred Floyd|John Godfrey|Tom Wideline|Warren Stevens|Miceal Jackson|Mark Baue|Bill Donahue|Stephen Koh|Gabriel|Holland|Allen Rubin|Rick Garcia|Thomas Bosack|Jason Coleman|Vic Miyahira|Jimmy Williams
keywords: unsynchronized dubbing|katana|screaming in pain|frying pan|gaffer tape
title: Samurai Cop
